name: 1 Million Zombies
summary: 1 Million Zombies is a post-apocalyptic action game where the player takes on a world overrun by hordes of the undead. The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by driving a series of vehicles and eliminating as many zombies as possible.

name: 1 Meter
summary:
Touch for right turn.
Release for left turn.
Make the longest pasta ever.

name: 1 Minute Commuting to School
summary: 1 minute Commuting to school is a 2D action game where the main character races to school before being late. Players choose between a bicycle or a bat to take different routes. With simple controls and fast-paced gameplay, it's fun for both casual players and speedrunners. Available on Steam.

name: 1 Moment of Time: Silentville
summary: 1 Moment Of Time: Silentville is a casual adventure with hidden objects and logical puzzles.

name: 1 Minute RPG
summary:
This is simple and fast RPG!

There is no difficult skill tree or huge maps, and complicated system. You just press left or right button, then you can level up and clear the stage.

name: 1M84
summary: An upcoming MMO RPG game with lots of fun and things to do! The things you can do are endless. With server updates planned every week!

name: -1: Minus Ichi
summary: -1 is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where you explore Sonoko's dreams, a girl who's falling asleep while travelling on a bus to an unknown destination.
